name: GetPageOfMileageEntries
description: Use this endpoint to load a page of Mileage entries.

Filter.description: Use this parameter to set the filtering for fields. [filtering instructions](#section/Retrieving-data/Filtering)

Sort.description: Use this parameter to set the sort fields and direction. [sort instructions](#section/Retrieving-data/Sorting)

PageSize.description: Use this parameter to set the page size. [pagination instructions](#section/Retrieving-data/Pagination)

SkipPages.description: Use this parameter to set number of pages to skip. [pagination instructions](#section/Retrieving-data/Pagination)

$ul:
**date**: The date of the project mileage entry

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**distance**: The distance amount that the mileage registration should contain

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**employeeNumber**: The employee number of the project mileage entry

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**from**: The starting place of the travel which the mileage registration reflects

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false
**includeApprove**: By default it is true, so a user with rights will be able to approve.

**isApproved**: Value specifying if the mileage was approved. If it was approved, it can not be updated anymore.

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false

**number**: The unique number of the project mileage entry

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true

**objectVersion**: The object version, required for PUT requests.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**projectNumber**: The project number of the project mileage entry

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false

**to**: The destination of the travel which the mileage registration reflects

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**developerHint**: Some hints for the developer that might help avoid the error.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

**errorCode**: The error code.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

Filterable: not filterable
